lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: The Israelites camped by a mountain. What was its name?
God said, 'If my people obey me, then they'll become...' what?
When Moses told God's message to the leaders, what did they say?
answers: Give us more time to think

questions.text: What did God tell the people to do to prepare for his coming in three days?
answers: Wash their clothes, put limits around the mountain, don't touch the mountain
Build an altar and bring sacrifices

questions.text: What happened when God came down on Mount Sinai?
answers: Fire, smoke, thunder, lightning, earthquakes, and a trumpet blast
The mountain erupted like a volcano

questions.text: What did God speak from the rumbling mountain?
How did the people feel when God spoke to them?
After hearing from God, what did the people say to Moses?
answers: You speak to God for us; we'll die if God speaks to us
We want God to keep speaking
We don't understand what God is saying

questions.text: How long did Moses stay on the mountain with God?
